channel.title: Service Discovery on Bits and pieces to remember

item.title: Consul - great Service Discovery tool
item.author: roman.heinrich@gmail.com
item.description:
Great introduction from Armon Dadgar (Hashicorp) to Consul to simplify some major pain points for SOA / Service Oriented deployments of arbitrary sizes.

Consul: Service Oriented at Scale
